Modify After you cancel your account, you will no longer be able to use that account to log in to U Academy, and you will not be able to use the same mobile phone number or email address to register a new account. The system will clear your personal information and historical data within a certain period of time. Please note that canceling an account is an unrecoverable operation, so please be careful! Not yet published Chapters Time Summarize result score level Current score Average result Result details Assessment deadline: %s The teacher has set the assessment, each part accounts for a certain weight and the score will change constantly during the learning process. Please take the score shown after the assessment deadline as the standard result. Scrape off the coating on the back of the paper textbook or study card and enter the activation code into the blank box below The following information is found based on the activation code you’ve entered: This course does not support mobile learning, please use computer 1. Scrape off the coating on the back of the paper textbook or study card to get the activation code \n2. The textbook should be activated under individual’s account. Please do not activate it for others Further reminder:\n.Each study card can only be activated once\n. The validity period of courseware is 180 days from the activation date\n. "1.Class files are not displayed on the teacher\'s homepage; \n 2.Unable to view class progress after archiving; \n 3. Cannot setup study plan for the class, assign homework, organize examination, release resource, etc.\n 4. Student account will no longer show the class;\n 5. Archived classes can be restored by cancelling archiving." 1.After exercise, you will upload your last recording. There will be data traffic incurred during uploading. It is recommended that you practice under the WIFI environment。 2.Able to practice without network access, but your recording cannot be uploaded. After having access to network, click on the synchronous learning record, your recording and learning records will be uploaded synchronously。

Your role in the course is Welcome to the course Your role in the course is %s You can manage all the courseware and teaching team of the course, check for teaching situation of all classes, and create your own class to carry out teaching After the course ended, teachers cannot publish new resources or activities, nor can teachers modify existing content in the course, and can only view and export data from the computer side.\n Students may continue to browse the content of the course, but may not be able to join the course.\n Confirm to end the course? After leaving the class, your records of assignments, discussions and examinations in the class will be cleared, while the records of your courseware will not be affected. Confirm to leave class? The class administrator or teacher will assign classes for you and you can assist the teacher in teaching The class administrator may assign classes to you, or you can create classes in the course to start teaching Create classes, assign teachers, and invite students to join the class (or be created by each class’ teacher) Please create your own class or wait for the class administrator to assign classes for you
Please wait for the class administrator to assign classes for you. You can enter the course directly. If the course is co-managed by the teaching and research group, it is only necessary for the administrator to create the course while the other teachers need only to join the teaching team. It is not necessary for each teacher to create the course separately. Course with the same name has already existed in our school (created by teacher %s). It is suggested that you contact the creator for confirmation, so as to avoid inconvenience caused by repeated name. Continue creating?
